mapper.select: select count(*) from TBDATA_SENTCHAGE t where 1=1 and t.crimid = #{crimid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, awps_abstract, awps_score, TO_CHAR(awps_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as awps_date, entry_name, TO_CHAR(entry_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as entry_date from ZHUNAN_RCKH where pr_id1 = #{crimid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by awps_date desc
